name: Leguna beach resort
description: You're eligible for a Genius discount at Laguna Beach Hotel & Resort! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in. Set in Cox's Bazar, 500 m from Cox's Bazar Sea Beach, Laguna Beach Hotel & Resort offers accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, a shared lounge and a garden. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel has family rooms. The hotel offers a buffet or Asian breakfast. Laguna Beach Hotel & Resort offers a terrace. The nearest airport is Cox's Bazar Airport, 3 km from the accommodation. We speak your language!
